channel.title: Types on Tofu: The Varieties
channel.description: Recent content in Types on Tofu: The Varieties

item.title: Regular
item.description: what: undrained, unpressed Japanese-style tofu has the highest water content and a custardy texture. Ultra-smooth and jiggly soft, silken tofu is ideal for puréeing as a base for soups, dressings, dips, and sauces. It also makes excellent dessert puddings and pie fillings.

item.title: Silken
item.description: what: undrained, unpressed Japanese-style tofu has the highest water content and a custardy texture. Ultra-smooth and jiggly soft, silken tofu is ideal for puréeing as a base for soups, dressings, dips, and sauces. It also makes excellent dessert puddings and pie fillings.
